DOC.brief_summary: Tension Type Headache ( TTH ) frecuent type headache disorder ( 1 person 5 worldwide ) . Individuals TTH typically present pericraneal tenderness increase cervical muscle tone . The common treatment primary care consist mainly analgesic medication . However , different technique manual therapy show effective treatment patient . Diacutaneous fibrolysis show clinical benefit relieve symptom tension type headache , scientific evidence analyzes effect . The hypothesis study add treatment diacutaneous fibrolysis usual conservative treatment beneficial effect different variable headache . The aim study assess effect diacutaneous fibrolisis intensity , frequency , duration headache cervical function patient tension type headache . A randomized controlled clinical trial design evaluate effectiveness diacutaneous fibrolysis technique compare usual general practicioner care patientes tension type headache . The study protocol approve Clinical Research Ethics Committee Aragon Community patient provide write consent . Eighty-two people clinical diagnosis TTH randomize intervention group control group . Intervention group receive three session Diacutaneous Fibrolysis , control group advise maintain usual pharmacologic treatment . Pain intensity ( VAS ) , frecuency , location , cervical range motion , head forward position pressure pain threshold ( PPTs ) measure baseline , postintervention , 1 month follow-up treatment . The Spanish version HIT-6 Questionnaire use measure disability/function baseline follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Diacutaneous Fibrolysis , Effects Tension Type Headache
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis TensionType Headache accord criterion ICDHIII . Currently undergo physiotherapy treatment headache Modification pharmacological treatment last month Presence red flag
